name: Blast Burn
description: Explosive projectiles rain down upon creatures in a 10 foot radius, centered on a point within range. Any creature caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 3d8 + MOVE fire damage on a fail and half as much on a success. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
